import SunEditor from 'suneditor-react'; import Checkbox from '@mui/material/Checkbox'; import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel'; import Dropzone from 'react-dropzone-uploader' import Radio from '@mui/material/Radio'; import 'react-dropzone-uploader/dist/styles.css' import "../online/online.css" import 'suneditor/dist/css/suneditor.min.css'; const options = [ { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Chocolate' }, { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Strawberry' }, { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Vanilla' } ] const SKUCodeTypeOriginal = [ { value: 'autoGenerated', label: 'Auto-Generated'}, { value: 'custom', label: 'Custom'}, { value: 'ean', label: 'EAN'}, { value: 'isbn', label: 'ISBN'}, { value: 'itf', label: 'ITF'}, { value: 'jan', label: 'JAN'}, { value: 'upc', label: 'UPC'} ] const SKUCodeTypeAdd = [ { value: 'custom', label: 'Custom'}, { value: 'ean', label: 'EAN'}, { value: 'isbn', label: 'ISBN'}, { value: 'itf', label: 'ITF'}, { value: 'jan', label: 'JAN'}, { value: 'upc', label: 'UPC'} ] const AddProduct = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [newBrandName, setNewBrandName] = useState(''); const [productCardActive, setProductCardActive] = useState(1); const [selectSKUCode, setSelectSKUCode] = useState(1); var [increaseAddCode, setIncreaseAddCode] = useState(0); var [increaseSupplier, setIncreaseSupplier] = useState(0); const [newSKUType, setNewSKUType] = useState([]); const [newSupplier, setNewSupplier] = useState([]); var AppendBody = []; var AppendSupplierBody = []; const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false); }; const handleChange = (e) => { if(e && e.__isNew__) { options.push({ value: e.label, label: e.value }) setNewBrandName(e.value) setOpen(true) } }; const addBrand = () => { console.log("123123") } const getUploadParams = ({ meta }) => { return { url: 'https://httpbin.org/post' } } const handleChangeStatus = ({ meta, file }, status) => { console.log(status, meta, file) } const handleSubmit = (files, allFiles) => { console.log(files.map(f => f.meta)) allFiles.forEach(f => f.remove()) } const chooseProduct = (selected) => { setProductCardActive(selected) } const removeSKUCode = () => { setIncreaseAddCode(--increaseAddCode) append(increaseAddCode) } const addSKUCode = () => { setIncreaseAddCode(++increaseAddCode) append(increaseAddCode) } const append = (index) => { AppendBody = [] for (var i = 0; i < index; i += 1) { AppendBody.push(

Inventory

The type of product we choose determines how we manage inventory and reporting.

chooseProduct(1)}>

Standard Product

This product is a single SKU with its own inventory.

chooseProduct(2)}>

Variant Product

This is a group of similar products which have different attributes, like size or color. Each variant is a unique SKU with its own inventory.

chooseProduct(3)}>

Composite Product

This product is made up of specified quantities of one or more products. A composite is a single SKU but uses the inventory of the products within it.
